song.eTitle: Must Jesus Bear the Cross Alone

verses.verse: Must Jesus bear the cross alone, and all the world go free? No, there's a cross for everyone, and there's a cross for me.
The consecrated cross I'll bear till He shall set me free; and then go home my crown to wear, for there's a crown for me.
Upon the crystal pavement, down at Jesus' pierced feet, with joy I'll cast my golden crown, and His dear name repeat.
